name: Client Self Check-In App
description: Digital receptionist enabling salon clients to self-check-in via tablet or phone

userStories.title: Welcome Screen - The Digital Receptionist Face
userStories.description: As a client arriving at the salon, I want to see a welcoming, branded screen that clearly shows me how to check in and informs me of any current promotions.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with store logo, name, and welcoming message
Time-based greeting: Good Morning/Afternoon/Evening
Promo banner area for promotions and announcements
Two prominent CTAs: Check In with Phone Number and Scan QR Code
Visual hierarchy: client knows what to do within 2 seconds
First-time visitor link: New here? Sign up
Idle behavior: Return to welcome after 60 seconds inactivity
Kiosk-friendly: No navigation chrome, full-screen experience
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.designNote: This screen must be designed using the Mango Designer skill

userStories.title: Phone Number Entry with Smart Formatting

acceptanceCriteria: Display large numeric keypad (0-9, backspace, clear)
Auto-format phone number as user types: (XXX) XXX-XXXX
Show entered number prominently above keypad
Continue button activates when 10 digits entered
Subtle haptic/visual feedback on key press
Support paste from clipboard (mobile web)
Back button returns to welcome screen

userStories.title: Error Handling, Edge Cases & Navigation
userStories.description: As a client, I want the app to gracefully handle errors and edge cases so I never get stuck and always have a clear path forward.
acceptanceCriteria: Network Errors: Show friendly Connection lost message, Try Again button, Start Over option
Queue completed check-ins locally if network fails, sync when restored
Show offline indicator banner when disconnected
Client Not Found: Message with Create Account or Try Different Number options
Multiple Appointments: Display list of all appointments, let client select which to check in
No Technicians Available: Show message with options to see partial matches or adjust services
Empty States: Appropriate messages for no services, no promos, empty categories
Back button on every screen (except welcome and final)
Back navigation preserves selections
Session timeout: Return to welcome after 60 seconds inactivity
Show Session expiring warning at 45 seconds with Continue option
Data Validation: Phone (10 digits), Names (1-50 chars), Email (valid format), Zip (5 digits)
Loading States: Skeleton loaders while fetching data
Error Recovery: All error screens have Try Again and Start Over options
If repeated failures (3+), suggest Please see front desk
npm run typecheck passes
